Conservation

LandCoverFraction_Forest

This is what one key/value pair in one of the indices in the json looks like:

{'geoId/13001': {'geoId/13001': {'LandCoverFraction_Forest': {'sourceSeries': [{'val': {'2015': 57.712213157748906, '2019': 56.10225251926496, '2017': 57.329201724571796, '2016': 57.08418588188137, '2018': 58.540199494228055}, 'measurementMethod': 'GoogleEarthEngine_MeanReduction', 'importName': 'Copernicus_GlobalLandCoverLayers', 'provenanceDomain': 'copernicus.eu', 'scalingFactor': '100', 'unit': 'Percent', 'isDcAggregate': True, 'provenanceUrl': 'https://land.copernicus.eu/global/lcviewer'}]}}}

import datacommons data = datacommons.get_stat_all(["geoId/27","geoId/55"], ["LandCoverFraction_Forest"])

for geo_id, stats in data.items(): print(f"Data for location: {geo_id}") for stat_name, stat_info in stats.items(): print(f"Stat name: {stat_name}") for series in stat_info['sourceSeries']: print(f"Source series:") for year, count in series['val'].items(): print(f"Year: {year}, Count: {count}") print(f"Measurement method: {series['measurementMethod']}") print(f"Import name: {series['importName']}") print(f"Provenance domain: {series['provenanceDomain']}") print(f"Provenance URL: {series['provenanceUrl']}") print()
